description: According to American media reports cited in the broadcast, advanced artificial intelligence tools, including Anthropic AI, are being linked to US strategic military planning. The developments come at a time of heightened military mobilization in the region.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - AI and Jobs: A New Era of Work, Not Layoffs
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact.
